column4: when installing ubby from the live cd, after partitioning the disks and clicking install, is it normal that the wait cursor is turning around for like 10 minutes without any new window popping up?
`dmesg | tail -20` what says?
VFS: busy inodes on changed media or resized disk sr
and then: eth1: no IPv6 routers present
ipv6 it's ok
have no X?
Xes in the dmesg log? no (or did you mean X server?)
any other suggestions?
what is with you system?
sudo apt-get -f install
I just configured the installation and pressed install (live cd)
server, desktop?
desktop
you will see a slideshow :) - 15 minutes to make a coffee
I know I'm supposed to see that, but I don't see it...
is it formatting my disks before the slideshow window appears or does it do that while it's on the screen?
while
o, I don't know exactly. But thereis a checkbox - show much more info in the bottom of the window
I told you twice: there is no window showing up
it seems like the installation was frozen last time. after the reboot everything went fine.
good
